title: S4 Support One Trick LF Duo (ADC or Jungler)

embed.description: LexyTheDeer / Silver 4 63LP / 263W 315L Win Ratio 46% / Thresh - 81W 102L Win Ratio 44%, Blitzcrank - 69W 68L Win Ratio 50%, Jarvan IV - 42W 35L Win Ratio 55%, Alistar - 16W 16L Win Ratio 50%, Twitch - 7W 14L Win Ratio 33%

body:
So I'm looking for duo for solo queue, I one trick Thresh. Was Gold 2 in season 7.

Quite aggressive in lane, aiming for platinum this season.

Discord is a must and a working microphone.

Add me in game.

IGN - LexyTheDeer
